client.download

Class ImageDownload

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • client.download.ImageDownload
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ImageDownload
extends java.lang.Thread
    ImageDownload handles the download of all Images served by the LANServer.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageDownload

        public ImageDownload(User user)
        Creates the ImageDownload.

        A new Socket on an free port is opened for the download. Then Thread.start() is called.

        Parameters:
        user - User who downloads the Images
        Since:
        1.0
